title.rendered: Nitish Kumar will visit Assam next month: AIUDF leader Badaruddin Ajmal

content.rendered:
xLok Sabha MP and leader of All India United Democratic Front (AIUDF) Badaruddin Ajmal said that Bihar Chief minister Nitish Kumar who is spearheading the formation of an anti-BJP front for the 2024 Lok Sabha polls will visit Assam next month.

Ajmal while talking to media persons in Guwahati said, “Congress and Mamata Banerjee led Trinamool Congress will be part of the anti-BJP front led by the Bihar chief minister. AIUDF will also join the front.”

Source : https://tinyurl.com/4c2y49ay
